section.p: A Quantity Measurement Observation records quantity measurements based on image data such as linear, area, volume, and numeric measurements. The codes in DIRQuantityMeasurementTypeCodes (ValueSet: 2.16.840.1.113883.11.20.9.29) are from the qualifier hierarchy of SNOMED CT and are not valid for observation/code according to the Term Info guidelines. These codes can be used for backwards compatibility, but going forward, codes from the observable entity hierarchy will be requested and used.

ol.li: Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode, where its data type is ActClassObservation
Contains exactly one [1..1] @moodCode, where its data type is x_ActMoodDocumentObservation
Contains exactly one [1..1] code, where its data type is CD
